Uses of LocalCipherProvider in org.lantern.privacy
 

Classes in org.lantern.privacy that implement LocalCipherProvider
 class AbstractAESLocalCipherProvider
          AbstractAESLocalCipherProvider This is a LocalCipherProvider that uses AES and some secure local means to store a generated key.
 class DefaultLocalCipherProvider
          This is a LocalCipherProvider that uses password based encryption (PBE) and prompts the user for some secret.
 class DummyLocalCipherProvider
           
 class MacLocalCipherProvider
          MacLocalCipherProvider This is a LocalCipherProvider that uses the OS X KeyChain to store a local key used to encrypt/decrypt local data.
 class SecretServiceLocalCipherProvider
          SecretServiceLocalCipherProvider This is a LocalCipherProvider that uses the DBUS "Secret Service" API to store a local key used to encrypt/decrypt local data.
 class WindowsLocalCipherProvider
          WindowsLocalCipherProvider This is a LocalCipherProvider that uses the Windows Data Protection API to store a local key on the filesystem used to encrypt/decrypt local data.
 

Constructors in org.lantern.privacy with parameters of type LocalCipherProvider
DefaultEncryptedFileService(LocalCipherProvider localCipherProvider)
